name: Birthday (ArctosGames)
description:
It's someone's special day today and I need you to grab a couple of things for me!

Birthday is a short, atmospheric game about a ghost town and the past surrounding it. Made with RPG Maker this is my first game that took about four months to complete as I learn the ways and is about a 10 minute length depending on the exploring you do- and I do encourage exploring to find out the lore of this place.

Feel free to follow me on Twitter at @arctosofficial or support me on Ko-Fi at ko-fi.com/arctosgames for more information on future projects. My second game is already under development.
